metadata.title: CVE-2022-45151 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: The stored-XSS vulnerability was discovered in Moodle which exists due toinsufficient sanitization of user-supplied data in several "social" userprofile fields. An attacker could inject and execute arbitrary HTML andscript code in user's browser in context of vulnerable website.

criterions.comment: moodle package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
